entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 a.m. MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 18 except minus 14 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Flurries except blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h except east 80 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 18 except minus 14 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h except east 70 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16 except minus 10 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind light except east 40 km/h near the Richardson mountains. High minus 16 except minus 10 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023
